projectGridLines.title: GHG Accounting (Scope 1, 2 and 3 emissions), CBAM (Carbon Border Adjustment  Mechanism), Materiality Assessment etc.
projectGridLines.description:
Description: Comprehensive GHG emissions accounting, CBAM implementation, and ESG

materiality assessment.

Skill sets: Data analysis, Environmental regulations, Project management, MS Office, Google Suite,

Secondary research.

Traits expectation: Attention to detail, analytical, problem-solving, communicative, collaborative,

proactive, ethical, adaptable.

Expected learning: Gain expertise in GHG accounting, CBAM implementation, materiality

assessments, data analysis, sustainability reporting, regulatory compliance, and project management

for advisory projects.

Specific courses required for project execution: Civil Engineering (Core), Introduction to Rock

Mechanics, Introduction to Environmental Engineering, Earthquake Resistant Design of Concrete

Structures, Mass Media and Content Design, Current Affairs, Introduction to Gender Studies,

Fundamentals of Finance and Accounting.
